claims.claim_text: A method comprising: (a) mixing a resin and solvent; (b) heating the mixture at 120 C for 30 minutes; (c) cooling the mixture to 25 C.

description.description_text:
In one embodiment, the process includes (a) preparing a slurry; (b) filtering the slurry; (c) drying the filter cake. The slurry may be heated to 80 C.

Then the dried cake is milled for 5 minutes.
